comment.author: 21554153@N03
comment._content: Many news historians are now recognizing the Bain News Service's impact and influence on black history in the US. The BNS was one of the first news companies in the country to photograph black Americans in a humane light. We tend to forget that, not too long ago, black Americans were rarely portrayed in photographs, broadcasts or motion pictures as anything but savage brutes or circus clowns. Eric Bryant, CEO Gnosis Arts Multimedia Communications LLC www.gnosisarts.com
